translation.gettingStartedBody: TON.vote is a completely decentralized on-chain DAO governance platform built exclusively for the TON ecosystem. /n Setting up a space for a DAO is free but requires submitting 2 transactions: /n 1. Space Metadata (DAO name, description, logo, socials) /n 2. Space Administrators (space owner and proposal publisher) /n Every transaction deploys a smart contract on TON blockchain mainnet. Both transactions cost about 1 TON in gas fees. /n Any future changes to one of the above will require submitting an update transaction. /n Need help? Join the TON.vote Telegram [support channel](https://t.me/TONVoteSupportGroup).
translation.editSpaceDetailsWarning: Edits will require to sign a transaction in your wallet
translation.spaceNameTooltip: Short name of the DAO, normally 1-4 words Capitalized separated by spaces.
translation.projectAboutTooltip: What is the purpose of this DAO? Normally 1-4 sentences. Formatted as Markdown
translation.spaceAvatarTootlip: HTTPS URL holding the DAO's logo as a circular PNG image sized 512x512 pixels with transparent background.
translation.tonDnsTooltip: If you own a [TON DNS](https://dns.ton.org/) domain name, enter it to prove the space's authenticity. For example: foundation.ton
translation.endedAndDidntPassedQuorum: Proposal ended and did not pass the minimum required quorum
translation.title: Title
translation.createProposalDescriptionTooltip: All background information needed to help members make a decision in this vote. Normally 3-10 sentences. Formatted as Markdown
translation.checkWallet: Please check wallet for pending transaction
translation.formLanguageInfo: Enter all fields in English. Future versions will support adding translations in multiple languages. You can update these fields later.
